title: Infoblox Threat Defense
description: This connector allows organizations to stream OpenCTI indicators to Infoblox Threat Defense (BloxOne). This will stream all active indicators to a custom list within Infoblox Threat Defense and remove any revoked indicators.
short_description: This connector allows organizations to stream OpenCTI indicators to Infoblox Threat Defense (BloxOne). This will stream all active indicators to a custom list within Infoblox Threat Defense and remove any revoked indicators.
